ComicInfo.Title: ...To Wake the Mangog!
ComicInfo.Summary: ...To Wake the Mangog!: While Sif recovers, Hela shows Thor the glory of eternal battle he can enter if he surrenders to her. Loki takes the throne of Asgard while Odin undergoes the Odinsleep. Ulik frees Mangog from captivity.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:38:50. [Issue ID 22025]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Toag, Elder of the Council Supreme (introduction),Muggers, Inc. (introduction),The Legion of the Lost (introduction)
